items.headline: 3M’s earnings beat can’t save the stock from the broad-market selloff
items.summary_en: Shares of 3M slipped in early Tuesday trading, as the Post-it Notes, Scotch tape and Command strips maker’s quarterly earnings beat and in-line profit outlook was overshadowed by a broad-market selloff.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Netflix expected to see ad boom, even as Warner Bros. acquisition casts shadow on earnings
items.summary_en: While investors don’t seem to happy that Netflix CEO Ted Sarandos has moved to acquire Warner Bros. Discovery, analysts say Netflix’s business fundamentals remain strong and are predicting strong ad growth ahead.

items.headline: My sister is buying our parents’ $3 million house, but wants to deduct $100K for renovations. Who’s right?

items.headline: ‘I’m simply exhausted’: I’m 55 and have $1.3 million for retirement. Can I retire next year?

items.headline: This U.K. firm chalked up the biggest hedge-fund profit ever last year
items.summary_en: Big bets on defence and infrastructure spending helped lift TCI’s annual return to 27%. The biggest hedge funds are proving themselves the best hedge funds in this era.

items.headline: ‘People are often unreasonable when money is involved’: My husband, 62, gave me a 5-year life estate. Would I have to pay for a new roof?

items.headline: Netflix bolsters its bid for Warner Bros. by making it all cash
items.summary_en: The change addresses one of Paramount’s arguments of why its buyout bid was better than that of Netflix — it didn’t include stock.
